ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
not(ischanged(Challenge_Match_Originating_Donation__c))
&&
Challenge_Match_Originating_Donation__c = TRUE
&&
(isblank( Challenge_Match_Name__c ) || isblank ( Challenge_Match_Start_Date__c ) || isblank ( Challenge_Match_End_Date__c ) || isblank ( text(Challenge_Match_Status__c )) || isblank ( text(Challenge_Match_Type__c )) || isblank ( Amount_Needed_to_Unlock_Challenge_Match__c ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: If this is a Challenge Match Originating Opportunity, please input Challenge Match Name, Challenge Match Start Date, Challenge Match End Date, Challenge Match Status, Challenge Match Type, and Amount Needed to Unlock Challenge Match.
